com.example.kit

Class ItemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemViewHolder>
      • com.example.kit.ItemAdapter

  • public class ItemAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemViewHolder>
    An implementation of a RecyclerView Adapter for an ItemViewHolder for Items within an ItemSet

      • onBindViewHolder

        onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemViewHolder>
        Parameters:

        position - The position of the item within the adapter's ItemSet.
